casebody.data:
ESTATE OF WORTH APPLE, on Behalf of Worth Apple, Deceased Employee, and Bessie Hutchins Apple, Widow of Worth Apple, Deceased Employee, Plaintiff
v.
COMMERCIAL COURIER EXPRESS, INC., Employer.
Michigan Mutual Insurance Company, Carrier Defendants. No. 117P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. R. James Lore, Raleigh, for Estate of Worth Apple. Norman F. Klick, Jr., Greensboro, for Courier Express & Insurance.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 11th day of March 2005 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of May 2005."
